metadata.name: React Native Platform-Specific Errors
metadata.description: Detection rules for iOS and Android platform-specific errors in React Native applications
metadata.author: Homeostasis Team

rules.suggestion: Check iOS Simulator configuration and Xcode installation
fix_commands: Open Xcode and launch iOS Simulator manually
Check Xcode Command Line Tools: 'xcode-select --install'
Verify iOS Simulator is installed in Xcode
Reset iOS Simulator if needed
Check available simulators: 'xcrun simctl list devices'

rules.suggestion: Check Android emulator configuration and Android Studio setup
fix_commands: Launch Android Studio and create/start an AVD
Check Android SDK and emulator installation
Verify ANDROID_HOME environment variable
Check available AVDs: 'emulator -list-avds'
Create new AVD if needed in Android Studio

rules.suggestion: Check iOS project configuration and Xcode build settings
fix_commands: Open ios/YourApp.xcworkspace in Xcode
Check iOS deployment target compatibility
Run 'cd ios && pod install' to update pods
Clean Xcode build folder
Check for signing and provisioning profile issues

rules.suggestion: Check Android project configuration and Gradle build settings
fix_commands: Clean Android build: 'cd android && ./gradlew clean'
Check compileSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion
Verify Android SDK and build tools installation
Check Gradle wrapper version compatibility
Review android/build.gradle and android/app/build.gradle

rules.suggestion: Check iOS code signing and provisioning profile configuration
rules.description: React Native iOS code signing error
fix_commands: Check signing configuration in Xcode project
Verify provisioning profiles are installed
Check Apple Developer account and certificates
Set correct team and bundle identifier
Use automatic signing if available

rules.suggestion: Check Android SDK installation and environment variables
rules.description: React Native Android SDK configuration error
fix_commands: Set ANDROID_HOME environment variable
Add Android SDK tools to PATH
Install Android SDK through Android Studio
Check SDK location in Android Studio preferences
Verify local.properties file in android folder

rules.description: React Native iOS deployment target version error
fix_commands: Check iOS Deployment Target in Xcode project settings
Update Podfile iOS platform version
Verify all dependencies support the target iOS version
Update React Native version if needed
Check minimum iOS version requirements

rules.suggestion: Check Android API level and SDK version compatibility
rules.description: React Native Android API level compatibility error
fix_commands: Update compileSdkVersion in android/app/build.gradle
Check targetSdkVersion compatibility
Install required Android SDK API levels
Update build tools version if needed
Check dependency API level requirements

rules.suggestion: Check iOS device connection and trust settings
rules.description: React Native iOS physical device connection error
fix_commands: Check iOS device is connected via USB
Trust the computer on iOS device
Enable Developer Mode on iOS device
Check device is selected in Xcode
Verify device is recognized: 'xcrun simctl list devices'

rules.suggestion: Check Android device connection and USB debugging
rules.description: React Native Android physical device connection error
fix_commands: Enable USB debugging on Android device
Check device is connected: 'adb devices'
Install or update ADB drivers if needed
Allow USB debugging when prompted on device
Check USB connection mode on device

rules.suggestion: Check iOS bundle generation and build phases
rules.description: React Native iOS bundle generation error
fix_commands: Check Bundle React Native code build phase in Xcode
Verify Metro bundler is running for debug builds
Check bundle path in Xcode build settings
Clear Xcode derived data
Verify React Native CLI version compatibility

rules.suggestion: Check AndroidManifest.xml configuration and manifest merging
rules.description: React Native Android manifest configuration error
fix_commands: Check AndroidManifest.xml syntax
Review manifest merge conflicts
Verify all required permissions are declared
Check activity and service declarations
Validate manifest element attributes

rules.suggestion: Check Info.plist configuration and required keys
rules.description: React Native iOS Info.plist configuration error
fix_commands: Check Info.plist syntax and format
Verify all required keys are present
Check permission usage descriptions
Validate bundle identifier and version
Check supported interface orientations
